channel.title: +1 Forward - Lessons Learned in 2021 and Rich and Rach's 2022 Gamer Resolutions
channel.description:
https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/1-forward/lessons-learned-in-2021-and-rich-and-rachs-2022-gamer-resolutions
Rach and Rich talk about the lessons they learned playing and running PbtA games in 2021, and they make their Gamer Resolutions for 2022.
**Timecodes:** 01:51 - Rich's Gaming Highlights 16:28 - Rach's Gaming Highlights 25:56 - Rich's Lessons Learned in 2021 34:23 - Rach's Lessons Learned in 2021 42:11 - Rich and Rach's 2022 Gamer Resolutions
